tool_description: Clever image compression that reduces the image size up to 80%
name: MegaOptim Image Compression
title: MegaOptim Image Compression

api_list.name: Results endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint provides results of the optimization

required_parameters.name: proces_id
required_parameters.description: The process id returned by the /optimize endpoint initially.

optional_parameters.name: timeout
optional_parameters.description: The timeout of the result endpoint. It will wait until timeout is reached for result.
